author: Rick Spilman
content: The heavy lift rig has been used, so far, promarily for removing derelict oil platforms. My guess is that the rig has already plaid for itself.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Is the cost of building the World’s Largest Chainsaw being 100% charged to the salvage insurers or are they expecting a rush of similar jobs?
